2.ar: باب قَالَ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ ‏{‏ وَأَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً طَهُورًا ‏}‏ وَقَالَ تَعَالَى ‏{‏ فَلَمْ تَجِدُوا مَاءً فَتَيَمَّمُوا صَعِيدًا طَيِّبًا ‏}‏
2.en: Allah, The Mighty and Sublime, says: And We sent down pure water from the sky. [1] And He, the Mighty and Sublime, says: And He caused water to descend on you from the sky, to clean you thereby. [2] And He, the Most High, says: And you find no water, then perform Tayammum with clean earth [3]

3.ar: باب بَدْءُ الْحِيضِ وَهَلْ يُسَمَّى الْحِيضُ نِفَاسًا
3.en: The Beginning Of Menstruation, And Can Menstruation Be Called Nifas?

4.ar: باب ذِكْرِ نَهْىِ الْجُنُبِ عَنْ الاِغْتِسَالِ، فِي الْمَاءِ الدَّائِمِ
4.en: Mentioning The Prohibition Of One Who Is Junub Performing Ghusl In Standing Water

5.ar: باب فَرْضِ الصَّلاَةِ وَذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ النَّاقِلِينَ فِي إِسْنَادِ حَدِيثِ أَنَسِ بْنِ مَالِكٍ - رضى الله عنه - وَاخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِهِمْ فِيهِ ‏.‏
5.en: Enjoining As-Salah And Mentioning The Differences Reported by The Narrators In The Chain Of The Hadith Of Anas Bin Malik (May Allah Be Pleased With Him), And The Different Wordings In It

10.ar: باب ذِكْرِ الإِمَامَةِ وَالْجَمَاعَةِ إِمَامَةِ أَهْلِ الْعِلْمِ وَالْفَضْلِ
10.en: Mention of Al-Imamah and the congregation

11.en: What is done at the beginning of the prayer

13.ar: باب التَّكْبِيرِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنَ الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ
13.en: The takbir when standing up following two rakahs

16.en: Eclipse of the sun and moon

17.en: When should the imam pray for rain

18.en: The narrations mentioned for the Fear Prayer

20.ar: باب الْحَثِّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْبُيُوتِ وَالْفَضْلِ فِي ذَلِكَ
20.en: Encouragement to pray in houses and the virtue of doing so
